chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.
items.plainText: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

items.text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.
items.plainText: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

items.text: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.
items.plainText: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

items.text: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
items.plainText: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

items.text: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
items.plainText: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

items.text: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
items.plainText: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

items.text: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.
items.plainText: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

items.text: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
items.plainText: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

items.text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
items.plainText: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

items.text: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
items.plainText: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

items.text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.
items.plainText: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

items.text: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;
items.plainText: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

items.text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work's sake. And be at peace among yourselves.
items.plainText: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work's sake. And be at peace among yourselves.

items.text: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
items.plainText: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.

items.text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
items.plainText: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.

items.text: Rejoice evermore.
items.plainText: Rejoice evermore.

items.text: Pray without ceasing.
items.plainText: Pray without ceasing.

items.text: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
items.plainText: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

items.text: Quench not the Spirit.
items.plainText: Quench not the Spirit.

items.text: Despise not prophesyings.
items.plainText: Despise not prophesyings.

items.text: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
items.plainText: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.

items.text: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
items.plainText: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

items.text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
items.plainText: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

items.text: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
items.plainText: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.

items.text: Brethren, pray for us.
items.plainText: Brethren, pray for us.

items.text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.
items.plainText: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.

items.text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.
items.plainText: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.

items.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
items.plainText: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
